Name: The Hunt
About the game: The name says it all - in The Hunt, you get, well, hunted by hunters who will stop at nothing to wipe you off the face of the earth. In order to survive, you must explore the land, scavenge materials, loot buildings, make/find weapons and fend off the hunters. And if you survive and scavenge for long enough, there might just be a way to escape. You can: - Move around and fight in a first-person perspective - Explore an expansive world with many different buildings, structures, and trees. - Build and break any object in the environment, such as buildings and trees - Collect resources by harvesting trees/buildings or looting chests scattered across the map - Find and craft a variety of items and weapons - Engage in fast-paced combat against the hunters - Collect weapons and tools with different qualities, ranging from wood to diamond - Operate a forge that requires fuel to craft higher quality items - Escape the forest in two different ways, each requiring a different method and materials, covered in the tutorial.
Meta Title: The Hunt: Sep 30, 2021, Axzyl and Full Overview
